Aaron Benjamin

UX Designer

Hello!

I'm a UX Designer and I believe design can be used to solve problems in the service of other people.

My mission is to demonstrate the value of Design Thinking by inviting the people I work with to participate in the creative process and delivering measurable results.

I'm a strong advocate for process. I've seen evidence over my career that great design is the product of great process.

My favorite project to date is being a Dad to my little girl. She’s a limitless source of inspiration, joy, and heart-melting giggles. She keeps me on my toes and keeps my imagination sharp.

Education

College

In 2008, I went to Full Sail University in Orlando, Florida to learn what it takes to be a designer.

Experience

HP Inc. // UX Lead // 2015 - Current

My role at HP Inc. is to provide UX design support and direction for various HP products including marketing tools, augmented reality software, and promotional landing pages.

AT&T Digital Experience // Sr. UX Designer // 2010 - 2015

I started with AT&T right out of college. In my time with AT&T, I was responsible for the Visual and Interaction design of customer-facing products. I worked with many teams over the years working on advertising, online bill-pay, and customer support tools.
